constituent: authority, tree, wood, pegasus, horse, pantomime horse, noon, sign of the horse, turkey
koohiiStory1: I have Eric Cartman of the “South Park” animated series, wearing a cop uniform, riding a wooden Pegasus (such as on a funfair), and yelling “RESPECT MY AUTHORITAH!!!”.
koohiiStory2: No one has the authority to tie up a pegasus to a tree!
myStory: quyền lực. được phép. hợp pháp. cây cho phép con chim đậu buổi trưa
readingExamples: 権利 (けんり), 権威 (けんい), 人権 (じんけん)
words:
棄権(きけん): abstain from voting, renunciation of a right
権威(けんい): authority, power, influence
権(けん): authority, the right (to do something)
権限(けんげん): power, authority, jurisdiction
権力(けんりょく): power, authority, influence
主権(しゅけん): sovereignty, supremacy, dominion
政権(せいけん): administration, political power
特権(とっけん): privilege, special right
権利(けんり): right, privilege
